That's a great idea! Box of Style's customer service team might have some valuable insights and recommendations for skincare products that are similar to Glow Theory. Since they curate a selection of beauty and lifestyle products for their boxes, they likely have knowledge about various brands and products that might suit your skin type and preferences.

When you reach out to them, you can ask something like:

"Hi Box of Style team, I'm canceling my subscription, but I wanted to ask if you have any recommendations for skincare products similar to Glow Theory's facial moisturizer? I loved their product and would love to explore other options. Are there any brands or products you'd suggest that might be a good fit for my skin type?"

By asking for their expertise, you might discover new brands or products that you haven't tried before, and who knows, you might find an even better match for your skin!

Remember to provide your skin type and any specific concerns you have (e.g., dryness, sensitivity, acne-prone), so they can give you more tailored recommendations.

Good luck, and I hope you find some great new skincare products to try!
